roleset.name: natural disaster: general spinning wind disaster

example.name: cyclone-n: arg2
example.text: Queensland , Australia was slammed by an F5 Cyclone this afternoon ( American EST ) .

example.name: cyclone-n: args 2, 5
example.text: Tropical cyclone Tracy is the smallest recorded cyclone , with a radius of gales extending less than 50 kilometres .

propbank.arg: with a radius of gales extending less than 50 kilometres

example.name: cyclone-n: arg1
example.text: They are basically a very deadly cyclone of wind and water .

example.name: cyclone-n: ADJ, arg5
example.text: Tropical Depression : A tropical cyclone with maximum sustained winds of 38 mph ( 33 knots ) or less .

propbank.arg: with maximum sustained winds of 38 mph ( 33 knots ) or less

roleset.note: CYCLONE-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to tornado, twister, hurricane, typhoon. (from cyclone.01-n)
The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.
